== Main Inclusion Report for unifdef ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/u/unifdef, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:'' kernel build dependency.
# ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=PRODUCT_NAME|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=PRODUCT_NAME|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review: no dynamic allocations, no unsafe printfs, looks fairly sane
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'normal'.
** No <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:unifdef|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Reasonable <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/unifdef|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> (still very fresh).
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
